text: I poklonyaytes' Allakhu, i ne pridavayte Yemu sotovarishchey. Delayte dobro roditelyam, rodnym, sirotam i nuzhdayushchimsya bednyakam, postradavshim iz- za poteri trudosposobnosti ili neschast'ya i poteri imushchestva, i sosedu kak rodstvenniku, tak i ne rodstvenniku, i drugu po rabote, i sputniku, i putniku, nakhodyashchemusya daleko ot doma, a takzhe vsem tem, kotorymi vladeyut desnitsy vashi. Poistine, Allakh ne lyubit khvastlivykh, gordelivykh, vysokomernykh, besposhchadnykh po otnosheniyu k lyudyam
